external_games.name: Big Fight: Big Trouble in the Atlantic Ocean

name: Big Fight: Big Trouble in the Atlantic Ocean
summary: Big Fight: Big Trouble in the Atlantic Ocean, is a 1992 fighting game / belt scrolling beat 'em up-hybrid arcade game developed and published by Tatsumi, and is one of their last arcade games before focusing on novelty sticker printing business. Tatsumi added two different modes to Big Fight: a beat 'em up mode and a versus fighting game mode.
